metadata.title: CVE-2019-11728 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The HTTP Alternative Services header, Alt-Svc, can be used by a malicioussite to scan all TCP ports of any host that the accessible to a user whenweb content is loaded. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 68.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11728` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 68.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 68.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 68.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '68.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
